answerText: Panurge [10] Panurge, Pantagruel, and all those other giants were created by Alcofribas Nasier, a pseudonym of this man.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Irvine and Michigan State A | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Pantagruel travels to the oracle of the divine bottle in an attempt to solve this companion's dilemma about marriage.  [10] Name this rascal, who becomes a governor in the Tiers Livre.
